ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: Plasmids were kindly provided by Robert Webster (St. Jude, Memphis, USA). We thank the animal caretakers at the Central Animal Facilities of the HZI for maintaining the mice, the department of Genome Analytics of the HZI for NGS sequencing and Heike Petrat, Karin Lammert, Rebecka WÃ¼nsche, and Christin Kurch for excellent technical assistance.
